section.49: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Usaid bin Hudair that:A man from among the Ansar came to the Messenger of Allah [SAW] and said: "Will you not appoint me as you appointed so-and-so?" He said: "You will encounter selfishness after I am gone, so be patient until you meet me at the cistern (Al-Hawd)
